meanings.sent1: I will prelocate the meeting room before the conference starts.
meanings.sent2: The treasure was prelocated on the map before the adventure began.
meanings.sent3: The detective prelocated the suspect at the crime scene, but he had an alibi.
meanings.sent4: She prelocated her keys in the usual spot, but they mysteriously disappeared.
meanings.sent5: Prelocating emergency exits can save lives in case of a fire.

meanings.sent1: The prelocated supplies were ready for the camping trip.
meanings.sent2: The prelocated hotel room made check-in quick and easy.
meanings.sent3: The prelocated seats at the concert had the best view of the stage.
meanings.sent4: The prelocated parking spots near the entrance were always taken first.
meanings.sent5: Prelocated landmarks helped the hikers stay on the right path.
